name: Balloon Buster
description:
This is a different take on a Break Out/Arkanoid clone I created after completing the Block Breaker section of the "Complete C# Unity Developer 2D" course. 

The game features the following:

  • Challenging game play with 10 levels of fun
  • PowerUps
  • Custom particle effects
  • Custom animations
  • Bonuses

Test your skills in this spin off of BreakOut/Arkanoid
